## BackendLockedError class

Thrown when the backend keychain or credential store is locked and requires user interaction (e.g. biometric prompt or password entry) before access can be granted.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class BackendLockedError extends VaultError 
```
**Extends:** [VaultError](./vaultkeeper.vaulterror.md)

</td><td>

`readonly`


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

Whether the lock can be resolved through an interactive user prompt. When `true`<!-- -->, callers may retry after prompting the user.
